revised_title: Stability Analysis of Aerofoil Motion and the Effect of Trailing Wakes
tldr: This article presents a two-dimensional hydrodynamical theory for moving aerofoils, focusing on the stability of their motion and the effect of trailing wakes. The author discusses the forces and couple on the aerofoil, the period equation for oscillations, and the conditions for stability. The study also compares and contrasts the results with previous works by von Karman and others.
